name: Robo Ball Juggle
description:
Created for Trijam-133 in just under 3 hours, with the theme: Don't drop it! The remaining time in the 3 hours was play testing after uploading.

Move your robot to keep the red ball out of the pit. How long can you last without dropping the ball?

Controls:

  • A or left arrow to move left
  • D or right arrow to move right

There is a known bug where the ball will fall through the robot's paddle when starting a new game. Refresh the page to fix this.

Colour scheme picked out by a 5 year old (literally)
